_definition.iso_639_3_eng: The time span of a day.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The category describes a specific day time span. It may be also used as a container for daily data.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: The time span of a week.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The category describes a specific week time span. It may be also used as a container for weekly data.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: The time span of a month.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The category describes a specific month time span. It may be also used as a container for monthly data.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: The time span of a year.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The category describes a specific year time span. It may be also used as a container for yearly data.
The category describes a time span that represents a range, you should expect both the [start](std_date_start.md) and [end](std_date_end) date of the range.
